Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on a well maintained and patroled road.
Room.LongDescription: The Lyanden Road follows a definite line between the forest and the desert. Normally, one might expect a gradual change between a forested area and sun-baked desert with nothing growing on it except sand dunes, but that doesn't seem to be the case with the K'tral Desert and the Enchanted Forest.
